### cloneAllCompileUnits() {#ab906c3b536c8af593e74cd3b37f3d1fd}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>uint64&#95;t llvm::DWARFLinker::DIECloner::cloneAllCompileUnits (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dwarfcontext">DWARFContext</a> &amp; DwarfContext, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dwarf-linker/dwarffile">DWARFFile</a> &amp; File, bool IsLittleEndian)</>}>
Construct the output <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/die">DIE</a> tree by cloning the DIEs we chose to keep above.

If there are no valid relocs, then there&#39;s nothing to clone/emit.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/dwarflinker/include/llvm/dwarflinker/classic/dwarflinker-h/#l00593">593</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/dwarflinker/include/llvm/dwarflinker/classic/dwarflinker-h">DWARFLinker.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/dwarflinker/lib/dwarflinker/classic/dwarflinker-cpp/#l02608">2608</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/dwarflinker/lib/dwarflinker/classic/dwarflinker-cpp">DWARFLinker.cpp</a>.

### cloneDIE() {#a1d20d4bda50d8c58ac28f4c61634aa6e}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>DIE &#42; llvm::DWARFLinker::DIECloner::cloneDIE (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dwarfdie">DWARFDie</a> &amp; InputDIE, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dwarf-linker/dwarffile">DWARFFile</a> &amp; File, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dwarf-linker/classic/compileunit">CompileUnit</a> &amp; U, int64&#95;t PCOffset, uint32&#95;t OutOffset, unsigned Flags, bool IsLittleEndian, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/die">DIE</a> &#42; Die=nullptr)</>}>
Recursively clone <code>InputDIE</code> into an tree of <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/die">DIE</a> objects where useless (as decided by lookForDIEsToKeep()) bits have been stripped out and addresses have been rewritten according to the address map.

<ParametersList title="Parameters">
<ParametersListItem name="OutOffset">is the offset the cloned <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/die">DIE</a> in the output compile unit.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="PCOffset">(while cloning a function scope) is the offset applied to the entry point of the function to get the linked address.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="Die">the output <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/die">DIE</a> to use, pass NULL to create one.</ParametersListItem>
</ParametersList>

<SectionUser title="Returns">
the root of the cloned tree or null if nothing was selected.
</SectionUser>

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/dwarflinker/include/llvm/dwarflinker/classic/dwarflinker-h/#l00586">586</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/dwarflinker/include/llvm/dwarflinker/classic/dwarflinker-h">DWARFLinker.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/dwarflinker/lib/dwarflinker/classic/dwarflinker-cpp/#l01685">1685</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/dwarflinker/lib/dwarflinker/classic/dwarflinker-cpp">DWARFLinker.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

## Private Member Functions
